site_name: Sherwood Close (Former Dean Gardens Estate)West EalingLondonW13 9YP
description: Details of the Demolition Method Statement and Construction Management Plan pursuant to condition 13 of planning permission 223090FUL dated 06.09.2024 as amended by permission 244029VAR dated 18.03.2025 for 'Redevelopment of the site including the demolition of the existing building and construction of 2 buildings ranging in height from 6 to 14 storeys to provide 185 self-contained residential units (Class C3) together with hard and soft landscaping, car parking, cycle storage and other associated works'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
